amendment.description: Amendment sought to change the date by which the bill rescinds obligated funds from February 11, 2011 to September 30, 2011.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 68 printed in the Congressional Record to create an exception for TIFIA projects within ARRA reductions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A066) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A066) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A066) offered by Mr. Polis.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
